QuestData.Title: House of Plagues
QuestData.Description:
The one with the knowledge you seek is a survivor of the House of Plagues. You already know him.
Plague Deviser Marileth may not be the most lucid of conversationalists, but he will know what to do with your plague.
Find him near the ruins of that fallen house. But be wary! Many things lurking there could end your existence without a hint of concern.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Plague Deviser Marileth in the House of Plagues.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Plague Deviser Marileth in the House of Plagues.
